name.jp: イベント用黄色い風船

description.en: Pretty Yellow Balloons that increase your Health Points (HP) by +150. Lasts 6 hours.
description.ar: Pretty Yellow Balloons that increase your Health Points (HP) by +150. Lasts 6 hours.
description.br: Belos balões que aumentam o valor de HP em +150. Dura 6 horas.
description.cns: 会使其上升HP150的漂亮气球
description.de: Ein gelber Ballon, welcher deine HP um 150 erhöht.
description.fi: Pretty Yellow Balloons that increase your Health Points (HP) by +150. Lasts 6 hours.
description.fil: Pretty Yellow Balloons that increase your Health Points (HP) by +150. Lasts 6 hours.
description.fr: ballon augmentant le total de vie de 150 (PV +150) pendant 6 heures
description.id: Pretty Yellow Balloons yang meningkatkan Health Points (HP) Anda sebesar +150. Berlangsung selama 6 jam.
description.it: Pretty Yellow Balloons that increase your Health Points (HP) by +150. Lasts 6 hours.
description.jp: HPが150上昇するきれいな黄色の風船。6時間継続
description.nl: Pretty Yellow Balloons that increase your Health Points (HP) by +150. Lasts 6 hours.
description.pl: Pretty Yellow Balloons that increase your Health Points (HP) by +150. Lasts 6 hours.
description.ru: Красивые желтые шарики, которые повышают запас ОЗ на 150. Не сдуваются целых три дня.
description.sp: Bonitos Globos Amarillos que aumentan tus Puntos de Salud (HP) en +150. Dura 6 horas.
description.sw: Pretty Yellow Balloons that increase your Health Points (HP) by +150. Lasts 6 hours.
description.th: ลูกโป่งสีเหลืองสวยที่จะเพิ่มคะแนนสุขภาพ (HP) ของคุณขึ้น +150 ใช้เวลา 6 ชั่วโมง
description.vi: Bóng bay màu vàng xinh xắn giúp tăng Điểm máu (HP) của bạn lên +150. Kéo dài 6 giờ.
